name: Banana Rama
content: Two buttermilk pancakes served with grilled banana, butterscotch sauce, cream and vanilla ice cream.

name: Bavarian Apple
content: Two buttermilk pancakes topped with apples marinated in lemon, sultanas, cinnamon and nutmeg, served with cream and vanilla ice cream.

name: Blackforest Cherry
content: Two chocolate pancakes served with cherries in a cherry brandy sauce, chocolate ice cream, cream and chocolate chips.

name: Blueberry Heaven
content: Two buttermilk pancakes served with blueberries in sauce, cream and vanilla ice cream.

name: Chocolate Jewels
content: Two chocolate pancakes served with chocolate ice cream, cream and our homemade chocolate sauce.

name: Jaffa Orange
content: Orange segments, Grand Marnier sauce, cream, vanilla ice cream and chocolate sauce served on two buttermilk pancakes.

name: Lemontyne
content: Two buttermilk pancakes served with lemon wedges, crystallised sugar, cream and vanilla ice cream.

name: Strawberry Patch
content: Two buttermilk pancakes served with fresh strawberries, strawberry coulis, cream and vanilla ice cream.
